product_name: O'Neill Thinskins Superlite Long-Sleeve Crew Rashguard - Men's
long_description: The O'Neill Thinskins Superlite long-sleeve crew rashguard brings warmth and protection to your time on the water. Front and rear 0.5mm neoprene panels offer core insulation and stretch. Stretchy arms are made of polyester and spandex to give a snug, comfortable fit that won't bunch up. Fabric provides UPF 50+ sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Paneling and flatlock seams are placed to work with a paddler's movements, reducing overall wear and chafing. Fabric loop connects to any board shorts (not included) with drawstring closure to prevent shirt ride-up. Hand wash in cold water and lay flat to dry. O'Neill Thinskins Superlite long-sleeve crew rashguard is formfitting.
short_description: The O'Neill Thinskins Superlite long-sleeve crew rashguard brings warmth and protection to your time on the water.
